description: From chimneys to ridge scrambles, the Alpine Hybrid Pant is built to move in the mountains. The Alpine Hybrid Pant combines Empel DWR technology—a PFC-free DWR that is superior in performance and durability to any other DWR solution—with four-way stretch and adds in abrasion-resistant reinforcements in high use areas.
name: Black Diamond Alpine Hybrid Pants - Mens
